nodes.text: Shalora was a Probe droid used by the Imperial Reclamation Service team led by Talos Drellik during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY Talos and Engineer Sorrel used Shalora to track down the wreckage of the Starrunner on Hoth.
Shalora appears appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Hoth.
